title: Consumer preference : fiction versus non-fiction books in England 2013

During the survey , 44 % of respondents stated they think books is Mixture_of_both , while 8 % stated it Non-fiction on the situation .
gold: This statistic displays the preferred book types ( fiction versus non-fiction ) among respondents in England in 2013.
Of respondents , 26 percent said they preferred fiction , while 44 percent reported liking a mixture of fiction and non-fiction .
